GetAllEvents.map: function(doc){emit(doc.isActive, [doc._id, doc.eventName, doc.tag, doc.date, doc.location, doc.invitees, doc.description, doc.eventHost, doc.isActive]);}

GetEventsByHost.map: function(doc){emit(doc.eventHost, [doc._id, doc.eventName, doc.tag, doc.date, doc.location, doc.invitees, doc.description, doc.eventHost, doc.isActive]);}

GetEventsByGuest.map: function(doc){emit(doc.invitees, [doc._id, doc.eventName, doc.tag, doc.date, doc.location, doc.invitees, doc.description, doc.eventHost, doc.isActive]);}

GetEventsBySearchKeyword.map: function(doc){emit(doc.eventName, [doc._id, doc.eventName, doc.tag, doc.date, doc.location, doc.invitees, doc.description, doc.eventHost, doc.isActive]);}
